body:
```
$ spack url-parse https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Matrix/Matrix_1.1-5-1.tar.gz
==> Parsing URL: https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Matrix/Matrix_1.1-5-1
    Matched regex 12: r'-((\d)+-\d)'

==> Detected:
    https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Matrix/Matrix_1.1-5-1.tar.gz
                                                          ---------- ~~~
    name:     matrix-1-1
    version:  5-1

==> Substituting version 9.9.9b:
    https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Matrix/Matrix_1.1-9.9.9b.tar.gz
                                                          ------ ~~~~~~~
```
I'll fix this once my url refactoring PR is merged.
title: Incorrect parsing for r-matrix
